name: Ducky Sorter
description:
My entry for the Winter 2017 72hour TF2Jam !
I didn't know it was on, until sunday afternoon. Oops.

Sort the ducks based on their team! You can orient the paddle using the mouse or keyboard keys.

It took me a few hours to get this done, and I'm okay with the result (the sound may be unbearable tho, I don't want to listen to this music anymore).

The visual & audio assets come directly from Team Fortress 2.
